text: Kagri kavumo'a agru hu'neankinka havi avu'ava zantera kavua nonkane. Ana nehunka kumikura kavesra hunentane. Hagi na'a agafare havi avu'ava zama nehu'za havigema nehaza vahera zamaza nehane? Hagi havi avu'ava zama nehaza vahe'mo'zama e'za, fatgo zamavu zamava'ma nehaza vahe'ma eme zamazeri havizama nehazagenka, na'a higenka kea osu akohenka nemani'ne?
